problem: 如图,已知AB、AD是⊙O的弦,∠B=30°,点C在弦AB上,连接CO并延长交⊙O于点D,∠D=30°,则∠BAD的度数是()
comment: 本题考查的是圆的性质和等腰三角形的性质,掌握圆的半径相等和等边对等角是解题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that AB and AD are chords of ⊙O, ∠B = N_0, point C is on chord AB, connect CO and extend the intersection of ⊙O at point D, ∠D = N_1, then the degree of ∠BAD is ()
